content: up and knit 16 sts pick up and knit a stitch between the instep and sole stitches pm knit in ribbed pattern for 32 sts pm pick up and knit a stitch between the instep and sole stitches pick and knit 16 sts along the side of the heel flap knit to bor marker 86 sts round 1 decrease knit to 3 sts before first marker k2tog k1 sm knit in ribbed pattern to second marker sm k1 ssk knit to eor round 2 knit to first marker sm knit in ribbed pattern to second marker sm knit to eor repeat rnds 1 & 2 until there are 64 sts remove bor marker and knit to first marker this is now your bor midfoot knit in ribbed pattern for 32 sts remove marker knit to eor repeat this round until foot measures 2 5cm less than desired length note if you prefer support or have a narrow foot use these directions instead repeat the next two rounds as follows until foot measures 2 5cm less than desired length round 1 k32 in ribbed pattern k1 *sl1 k1 repeat from * to one st before eor k1 round 2 k32 in ribbed pattern knit to eor at this point your sock should be at the base of your toes toe shaping note toe shaping is worked on ndl 1 instep 32 sts and ndl 2 sole 32 sts decrease round ndl 1-k1 ssk k to 3 sts before end of needle k2tog k1 ndl 2-k1 ssk k to 3 sts before end of needle k2tog k1 next round knit repeat last 2 rnds 6 more times 36 sts remain repeat decrease round every round 6 more times 12 sts remain cut yarn with 16 40cm tail and perform kitchener stitch on remaining sts weave in ends work second sock how to s kitchener stitch - hold the needles parallel in your left hand with the tips pointing in the same direction and wrong sides together the tail is coming from the piece on the needle furthest from you working in the following sequence pulling yarn through as if to knit or as if to purl with even gauge and keeping yarn under the points of the needles to avoid tangling and extra loops set up these two steps are only done once purl first stitch on front needle leave on knit first stitch on back needle leave on kitchener time step 1 knit first stitch on front needle slip off step 2 purl next stitch on front needle leave on step 3 purl first stitch on back needle slip off step 4 knit next stitch on back needle leave on repeat steps 1-4 across until all stitches are worked off the needles snugging up the stitches as you go your notes www thefiberseed com copyright © 2015 the fiber seed all commercial uses involving reproduction of this pattern in full or part are prohibited no commercial reproduction of garments by the
